entry.title: Recipe Book Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

My great grandma, grandma, and mom are fabulous cooks. The only problem is they didn't always document the best recipes. You may not have this worry. If you buy this charm and send it off to your favorite chefs maybe they will take the hint and compile all of your favorite recipes.
